title: Explained: How AI Can Fight Sex And Gender Bias In Healthcare
content: From assisting doctors with diagnoses to suggesting advanced treatments, Artificial Intelligence (AI) is transforming health and medicine.
summary: From assisting doctors with diagnoses to suggesting advanced treatments, Artificial Intelligence (AI) is transforming health and medicine.

title: Why Some Countries Are Not Picking Sides In Global Conflicts
content: For eight years now, the global economy has been weathering a succession of shocks - from trade conflicts and a pandemic to bloody wars in Ukraine and the Middle East.
summary: For eight years now, the global economy has been weathering a succession of shocks - from trade conflicts and a pandemic to bloody wars in Ukraine and the Middle East.

title: Meta, Google, TikTok Must Face Schools' Addiction Claims, Says US Court
content: Meta Platforms Inc., Google, TikTok and Snap will have to face lawsuits brought by school districts in federal court blaming their "addictive" apps for contributing to a mental health crisis among students.
summary: Meta Platforms Inc., Google, TikTok and Snap will have to face lawsuits brought by school districts in federal court blaming their "addictive" apps for contributing to a mental health crisis among students.

title: Share Owners Don't Count As "Working People": UK PM Keir Starmer
content: Prime Minister Keir Starmer says Britons who get additional income from stock holdings don't count as 'working people,' suggesting he's willing to raise taxes on investors.
summary: Prime Minister Keir Starmer says Britons who get additional income from stock holdings don't count as 'working people,' suggesting he's willing to raise taxes on investors.

title: NDTV, Dendy Cinemas Partner For Australia's 1st National Indian Film Festival
content: The National Indian Film Festival of Australia (NIFFA) will be held across seven cities in Australia from February 13-16 2025.
summary: The National Indian Film Festival of Australia (NIFFA) will be held across seven cities in Australia from February 13-16 2025.

title: North Korean Troops Join Russia's War In Ukraine
content: The first units of North Korean troops trained in Russia have been deployed in the Kursk region, a Russian border area, Ukraine's military intelligence service said.
summary: The first units of North Korean troops trained in Russia have been deployed in the Kursk region, a Russian border area, Ukraine's military intelligence service said.

title: Microsoft's Satya Nadella Got 63% Hike In 2024, Received Pay Package Of...
content: Microsoft Corp. Chief Executive Officer Satya Nadella received a pay package worth $79.1 million for fiscal 2024, a 63% increase from the prior year as the software maker worked to extend its strong position in artificial intelligence tools.
summary: Microsoft Corp. Chief Executive Officer Satya Nadella received a pay package worth $79.1 million for fiscal 2024, a 63% increase from the prior year as the software maker worked to extend its strong position in artificial intelligence tools.

title: From KFC To Burger King, Chains Remove Onions On E. Coli Risk
content: Yum! Brands Inc. and Burger King removed onions from some of their locations as the restaurant industry investigates an E. Coli outbreak first traced to McDonald's Corp.
summary: Yum! Brands Inc. and Burger King removed onions from some of their locations as the restaurant industry investigates an E. Coli outbreak first traced to McDonald's Corp.

title: Mother Breaks Down As Delphi Murder Victim's Last Moments Shown In Court
content: The mother of Liberty "Libby" German broke down when a video showing the final moments of her daughter's life was played in the courtroom during the Delphi murder trial.
summary: The mother of Liberty "Libby" German broke down when a video showing the final moments of her daughter's life was played in the courtroom during the Delphi murder trial.

title: Scientists Plan To Recreate Extinct Creatures Like Dinosaurs As Robots
content: Researchers hope these robotic recreations will enhance our understanding of the natural world and evolutionary history.
summary: Researchers hope these robotic recreations will enhance our understanding of the natural world and evolutionary history.

title: "Our Pride": Lone Child Brings Hope To Japan's Puppet Village
content: Riding his tricycle with cheerful abandon, Kuranosuke Kato is the only child in his tiny, depopulated Japanese village overrun by life-sized puppets.
summary: Riding his tricycle with cheerful abandon, Kuranosuke Kato is the only child in his tiny, depopulated Japanese village overrun by life-sized puppets.

title: Ex-Baseball Coach Charged With Sexually Abusing 7 Kids In US
content: Former baseball coach Nicolas Morton faces charges ranging from sex abuse to sexual misconduct with a child under 13 years old and forcibly touching kids' intimate parts.
summary: Former baseball coach Nicolas Morton faces charges ranging from sex abuse to sexual misconduct with a child under 13 years old and forcibly touching kids' intimate parts.

title: Elon Musk Spent At Least $132 Million To Elect Donald Trump, Allies
content: Elon Musk gave another $56 million to elect Donald Trump and other Republicans in the final weeks of the 2024 election, bringing to at least $132 million the amount spent by the world's richest person to elevate his allies to the White House.
summary: Elon Musk gave another $56 million to elect Donald Trump and other Republicans in the final weeks of the 2024 election, bringing to at least $132 million the amount spent by the world's richest person to elevate his allies to the White House.

title: 3 Journalists Killed In Israeli Strike, Says Lebanese State Media
content: Lebanese state media said Friday that separate Israeli air strikes killed three journalists in eastern Lebanon and flattened buildings in southern suburbs of Beirut.
summary: Lebanese state media said Friday that separate Israeli air strikes killed three journalists in eastern Lebanon and flattened buildings in southern suburbs of Beirut.

title: EY Fires Staff In US For Taking Multiple Online Training Courses At Once
content: Ernst & Young (EY) recently fired dozens of employees in the US for attending multiple online training courses simultaneously during the firm's learning week organised earlier this year.
summary: Ernst & Young (EY) recently fired dozens of employees in the US for attending multiple online training courses simultaneously during the firm's learning week organised earlier this year.

title: World Bank's New Gender Strategy To Increase Women's Economic Participation
content: The World Bank announced a new gender strategy aimed at boosting economic opportunities for women and enabling their participation in the global economy.
summary: The World Bank announced a new gender strategy aimed at boosting economic opportunities for women and enabling their participation in the global economy.

title: Opinion: We Still Don't Know What Kamala Harris Really Is About
content: The Republicans stole the constituency in broad daylight, while the Democrats were busy playing woke and pandering to the extreme fringe of the party.
summary: The Republicans stole the constituency in broad daylight, while the Democrats were busy playing woke and pandering to the extreme fringe of the party.

title: Menendez Brothers, Jailed For Life For Killing Parents, Could Be Freed
content: Lyle and Erik Menendez, who in 1989 murdered their wealthy parents, could be released from prison after a US prosecutor said he would ask a judge to look again at their sentences.
summary: Lyle and Erik Menendez, who in 1989 murdered their wealthy parents, could be released from prison after a US prosecutor said he would ask a judge to look again at their sentences.

title: King Charles Faces Calls To Compensate For UK's Brutal Past At Summit
content: Britain's King Charles faced calls to reckon with his country's colonial past Friday, as a summit of Commonwealth allies turned into a factious debate about the legacy of slavery and empire.
summary: Britain's King Charles faced calls to reckon with his country's colonial past Friday, as a summit of Commonwealth allies turned into a factious debate about the legacy of slavery and empire.

title: Shipping Firm To Pay $100 Million In Baltimore Bridge Collapse Settlement
content: The US Justice Department said Thursday that it has reached a $100 million settlement with the Singaporean owner and operator of a cargo ship that destroyed a Baltimore bridge.
summary: The US Justice Department said Thursday that it has reached a $100 million settlement with the Singaporean owner and operator of a cargo ship that destroyed a Baltimore bridge.
